name: Masters union
description: Masters’ Union is a next-generation non-conventional business school established in the year 2020 in Gurugram, Haryana. Masters’ Union is amongst the topmost business schools in the country with a record-breaking placement record over the years.
features: Masters’ Union offers a 4-year Undergraduate Programme in Technology and Business Management and a 16-month Postgraduate Programme in Technology and Business Management.

The programs offered by Master's Union are taught by CXOs, MDs, eminent public leaders, and even Members of Parliament, apart from distinguished global faculty from top B-schools who regularly consult with Fortune 500 companies.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: A unique practitioner-led higher education institution, where courses are taught by CXOs from Morgan Stanley, Tata, StanChart, Google, Twitter, Reliance, Razorpay, etc. Our recruiters include Mckinsey, BCG, Bain, Softbank
ShortDescription: A technology-focused business school led by veteran leaders who are rethinking business education from the ground up.
enhanced_description: Masters' Union is a next-generation, non-conventional business school established in 2020 in Gurugram, Haryana. It focuses on rethinking business education from the ground up, offering a 4-year Undergraduate Programme and a 16-month Postgraduate Programme in Technology and Business Management. A unique practitioner-led institution, its courses are taught by CXOs, MDs, eminent public leaders, and global faculty who consult with Fortune 500 companies. Masters' Union is recognized as a top business school in the country, boasting a record-breaking placement record with recruiters including Mckinsey, BCG, Bain, and Softbank.
key_use_cases: Providing higher education programs focused on technology and business management
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for aspiring professionals
Developing a pipeline of industry-ready talent for companies
Facilitating career progression through practitioner-led education
competitive_advantages: Practitioner-led education from CXOs, MDs, eminent public leaders, and Members of Parliament
Non-conventional and next-generation approach to business education
Record-breaking placement record with top-tier recruiters
Distinguished global faculty with industry consulting experience
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (as a training and talent development provider)
Talent Acquisition (as a source of skilled candidates)
roi_benefits: Enhanced skill acquisition and retention for participants
Improved learning efficiency through practitioner-led and non-conventional methodologies
Access to a talent pool with practical, industry-relevant skills for recruiting organizations
primary_users: Undergraduate and postgraduate students seeking careers in technology and business management
Companies and organizations seeking to recruit skilled professionals in technology and business
